sections.title: Why WebSockets?
sections.content: HTTP is request-response (slow for games). WebSockets keep a permanent pipe open, allowing instant 2-way data flow.

What is a 'tick rate'?
options: How many times per second the server updates the game
The clock speed of the CPU
questions.correctAnswer: How many times per second the server updates the game
questions.explanation: A tick rate of 20 means the server updates the world 20 times per second.
